website_summaries.verdict: If having a lid is important to you, consider this waterproof bag. The lid fastens with hook-and-loop closure.
pros: Rectangular bag with built-inLiquiShield waterproof interior
Seals unsightly garbage out of view
Waterproof liner makes for easy cleanup

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality strap attatchment
customer_reviews.text: Terrible construction. Lasted a week before the one side of the strap ripped off
customer_reviews.author: JEA

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: On originally receiving it, it looked to be of good quality. After some months, the straps fell apart. Like literally fell apart (mine has white straps, unlike the other pics). I read that this happened to another reviewer, and I couldn't believe it... The straps now have the strength of something like plastic food wrap. They disintegrate in your hands, leaving a powdery residue. Never seen anything like that. ---------------- edit July 7, 2017 Wow! They sent me another one for free, unasked. Just surprised me by showed up on my doorstep. This new one has clearly better straps. I look forward to having it in my car again.
customer_reviews.author: q290378gh9f

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it and used 2 months...then the straps broke. Let me rephrase that...the straps literally broke and fell apart in my hands, I had pieces of it all over the floor of the car. It just disintegrated in my hands. Would def not recommend this for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Che'ri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nick nack bag to keep the extra little things ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect nick nack bag to keep the extra little things that do not fit in your car's glove box or possibly leaking in there. I use it not as a trash bag but as a extra glove compartment box for things. It has velcro closure at top which is convenient. Perfect size small enough to quickly move from front floor board/seat to behind the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A place for my car trash
customer_reviews.text: Up until I got this car trash bin, I would just toss trash to the side and get it out later. This is really nice because I can toss all my trash in and dump it later. No more searching under my seats and around my car looking for trash/water bottles (not that there's a lot). It's convenient. It's well made. It has a velcro closure. It's water proof. And it has a side pocket for wipes, tissues etc. It's much nicer than hanging a plastic bag in your car. Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia HayesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This trash bin is great. It stays put better than a round one due to its elongated shape. It stays open for easily tossing in trash. My car has never looked cleaner. One wish: I wish the strap was black instead of white.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Great product, useful, durable
customer_reviews.text: Geat for the car! Sands alone or hang it on the back of the seat. I got two of them: one sits on the floor behind the passenger seat. I can put a plastic shopping bag in it and use it as a trash can. The other hangs off the seat into the storage area of my SUV. I put shopping bags, and a small umbrella in it. Holds whatever you want to use it for. Nice way to recycle those bags, too. Has clips that hold the bag in place. Solid enough to hold CDs or whatever you like. Great product and great buy. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: kindle10.1

customer_reviews.title: Convenient garbage can for your car!
customer_reviews.text: I usually just slap a plastic bag around my vehicles gear shifter if it's located on the floor, but my current car is a 2008 Buick LaCrosse, so I'm stuck with an old fashioned shifter. I bought this and figured it would be an interesting placement of a trash can in the car, but have actually found it more useful then just setting the trash on my floor. I love the fact that it's waterproof and leakproof so I don't have to worry and any leftover drink leaving all over the place. A fair price for a very durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Z.Wyant

customer_reviews.title: I can detach it easily from the headrest to take with me
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag to hold drinks, snacks, book and other little things. When I am driving, I attach to headrest in front passenger seat on the front side. When I go with others, I attach on the back of the front seat. It is small enough that it is not in the way, yet large enough to hold several items. I can detach it easily from the headrest to take with me. It is a good size and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Myra

customer_reviews.title: I love the trash can
customer_reviews.text: I love the trash can. Please, pay attention to the measurements. If you have kids in the car seats it can get in the way when hung on the back of the front seats. I took two stars off for the following reason. The way the trash can is folded and packed creates a permanent crease in its side walls. That leads to a slight deformity and prevents the trash can from staying perfectly rectangular. I ended up inserting two pieces of cardboard into the side pockets to keep the trash can the intended shape.
customer_reviews.author: Mareika

customer_reviews.title: It is leakproof! Even holds up to carsickness.
customer_reviews.text: This product IS leakproof! I just ordered my 2nd one because the leakproofness on the first one I bought was put to the test last week, and now it’s in the trash. Let’s just say if you have someone who is prone to getting carsick, this is the thing to have! IT HELD UP! While stuck in stopped freeway traffic where pulling over wasn’t an option, I’m glad this was on hand... and now you know why the original is in the trash, and I am ordering a second.
customer_reviews.author: Cristy

customer_reviews.title: Trash, Soda cans, Diapers, whatever fits
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2018 Ford Focus. Previously I was using a plastic grocery bag. Gotta say this is much better. Nice design with the extra pockets, solid material and I like the leak-proofing. The snap strap made it easy to hook on to the back of the passenger seat. The size is just about right, at least fory car. About the size of a lunch cooler box. A great buy at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Damian D.

customer_reviews.title: Very small, don't use as a trash can.
customer_reviews.text: I know that the dimensions are probably listed, but this thing is much smaller than I expected. I was hoping to use it as a trash bin but it's really too small for that pupose - can maybe fit one empty fast food restaurant drink cup in it and a few napkins. So yeah useless as a trash bin unless you want to empty it out every other day. I'm going to use it as a drink holder instead and put a few of those small water bottles in it.
customer_reviews.author: Totally Legit Review

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Car Trash Bin Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: This auto trash can is a great size, made from quality materials. I like the mesh "baskets" on the sides and front, as I can stick my water bottle in there. The strap is adjustable so can be easily carried on back of the seat (as indicated in photo), BUT I think an improvement would be that there was a way to have this bag hang just under the glove department, so that a driver with no passenger could access the trash safely. I travel long distances often, alone, and can't reach behind the seat to toss the trash. I ordered 2 of these and have one in my car and one in hubby's car. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Catheter

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't expecting that.
customer_reviews.text: When I originally purchased this item it came with a faulty latch which made it useless. After leaving my initial bad review EPAuto was kind enough to send me a new one with the correct latch and all is good in the world. Thanks EPAuto!
customer_reviews.author: Augie Max

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and function!
customer_reviews.text: Well this officially cleaned up my car for good. Not sure how or why I went so long without a trash can in my car. Makes total sense. I rarely have anyone in my car so I hang it around the passenger seat head rest and keep it in the front of the car. But if someone hops in, it easily swings back around to the back. It's heavy duty, water proof inside and has velcro to keep it closed if you don't want people to see your garbage. My husband followed suit and bought one too - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my purchase; great deal, nice quality and like everything about it! I'm using as a trash but it's great that it can be used in more ways. I also like that I can hang it on the back of the passenger head rest for easy access - not fumbling for a trash bag on the floor as I previously was, dangerous! I like the adjustable strap so it can be lowered when people are in the back seat so it isn't in their face as much. I'll probably remove when kids are in the back or hook around the center consol and rest on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Abell

customer_reviews.title: fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: really was impressed, it was larger than I thought it would be, has a nice easy design and exceptionally well made. I actually bought it for trash but realized it has a far better use for storing an umbrella, some tissues, extra cords I keep in the car, and some misc stuff I keep in my car (like a hairbrush). I will purchase another one to use for trash because I can definitely see the value in using it for that that too!
customer_reviews.author: Tankorz

customer_reviews.title: Just that it does not have a way to hold the garbage bag in place around
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well in my sedan. just the right size. Not too big. Just that it does not have a way to hold the garbage bag in place around, incase you want to use it as a garbage bag. This might be a good option for parents with small kids. But if you have adults sitting on the back-seat, then it is very uncomfortable to have a big black bag in-front of your face.
customer_reviews.author: Ravindra

customer_reviews.title: Plastic bags do not stay open well inside this
customer_reviews.text: Plastic bags (like from Walmart) do not fasten around the edges well at all. As I reach behind me to put trash away while driving, I almost always end up pushing the bag down (you know, keeping eyes on the road) and having to clean it up later as the trash piles in the bottom of the bin. Would really only be effective for backseat passengers, don't recommend for use in your own car as the driver.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETELY LEAKPROOF
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite thing I have bought for my car. With a teenager and a couple four year olds there is always trash in my car and this will at least keep it contained. And when they say leakproof they mean it- those kids have dumped half eaten popsicles in there and it doesn't leak a drop. The inside is all slick and one piece so it is easy to wipe out or rinse out. I would recommend this for anyone with a vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Brandifaith

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This fits great on the passenger side hooked onto the center console of my '17 Chevy Volt and doesn't get in the way when I have a passenger. It hardly shows against the black interior, and it easily opens to put trash into it and then closes with velcro to keep it hidden. I like the side pockets, too, where I store my phone charging cord. It's just what I need to keep my car clean.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great trash can.
customer_reviews.text: 2017 mustang gt. I hang it off the passenger seat (rear facing) and dump it whenever I get gas. I only use it for trash but I am thinking of getting another one to use a storage. Works great and looks nice. Can hold about 4 med sized monsters and a few empty bags of chips without the trash coming out. Even with windows down.
customer_reviews.author: Edantes

customer_reviews.title: Love this trash bag!
customer_reviews.text: We love this trash bag. After buying one, I have purchased three more. My husband and I both have them in our vehicles and I have given them as gifts. So easy to keep the trash in a central location and then empty the bag when we fill up with gas. A great buy and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a pretty good bag
customer_reviews.text: Great price and does the job, but it doesn’t keep the shape like the picture. It is shaped more like a reusable bag now which leaves the opening hanging open making it easier for some trash to fall out if the trash is large or if the bag is getting full. It’s still a good trash bag, I just wish it looked neater/more compact.
customer_reviews.author: BrokenFamily UnitedBy AmazonPrime

customer_reviews.title: Functional and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this for trash in my new car. The strap is long enough to hang it behind my center console between the seats. It can sit low enough so the rear heating/cooling vents are not covered. No issues with leaking. I've had it for 2 years now and it's holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Runner DL

customer_reviews.title: I searched all over Amazon for a good trash holder for my 2016 Subaru Impreza Hatchback
customer_reviews.text: Very thick, supportive sides. I searched all over Amazon for a good trash holder for my 2016 Subaru Impreza Hatchback. A lot of other ones looked too small or too flimsy. This one feels like a cooler and fits perfectly around my center console so that it sits in the back middle. Fits a plastic grocery bag perfectly and the side mesh pockets are a huge plus. I store my extra bags and napkins in them! Would highly recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: tfloersch

customer_reviews.title: All good.
customer_reviews.text: Nice item and it will come in handy in my new car. I got to wonder why they used a white strap. The interior of my car is black, the bag is black, but the white strap stands out against the dark seat and looks out of place. I will try to find a black strap to replace it. The price was great and the bag appears to be quality made..
customer_reviews.author: Mark Buck

customer_reviews.title: Needed this so badly
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it fits on the back of the passenger side seat from the head rest. As the driver, I can easily place waste in the bag just by feeling it. No need to turn my head. So far, the bin has served its purpose and seems to be sturdy and washable, should it need freshening up. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: freakmeister

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small hanging "organizer" to use to put items in that I use with my 3 year old grandson. It holds Puffs, a small blanket, and wipes with no problem, along with a couple of other small items. It appears to be well-made and waterproof as promised. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: works well would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This works well in my Mitsubishi outlander sport. Helps to keep trash off the floor and it is easy to clean if stuff gets sticky. I wouldn't recommend this if you are looking to chuck trash in it for a long car ride with lots of kids, but for weekly commuter trash it works great ( single person or 2 person weekly trash)
customer_reviews.author: Reviewerlady11

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally bought two, glad I did. I'm a medical Courier and spend 8 hours in my work car. I've got one hanging off the front of the passenger seat and one off the back. It's sturdy, well made and has lots of pocket room. One I use to keep stuff in and one I use for trash. It's a great size and really deep.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyMiche

customer_reviews.title: leak proof and perfect size for the car
customer_reviews.text: leak proof and perfect size for the car. I put mine around my shifter and helps keep my car cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Jared Tennyson

customer_reviews.title: Glad He did not feel the need for this item :-)
customer_reviews.text: I got this bin for hubby who laughed at me...BUT I am ready and happy to take the bin/bag and put it to use in my vehicle ~ it will hold my extra water bottles and take along snack for trips. looks like it should last a good while with my planned usage. I am happy !
customer_reviews.author: Hannah T

customer_reviews.title: Great for what I need it for-which is a small ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for what I need it for-which is a small trash bin for my car. It's nice and well made. It's not too big and not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Good size and durability
customer_reviews.text: Good size and durability. Cleans easily. Not easy to close for privacy, and allows for considerably fewer contents, but overall good purchase. If I routinely had other passengers in my car, I think I'd opt for another type of bag that better allows me to hide the contents.
customer_reviews.author: Henny Penny

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, doesn't sag.
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I'm using this for quick access storage: binoculars, rain slicker, umbrella, first aid kit, flashlight, etc. Love the pockets on the outside, nice and roomy on the inside. It's well made and doesn't sag. Thanks for the quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great for new driver’s gift  Sweet sixteen gift
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one bought for my son and his 16 yr old,driving friends. It fits nicely on the back of the passenger seat with out poking the passenger. It holds quite a bit and has not leaked yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly KS Clausius

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: This lined trash holder was so nice to have on my recent trip. Driving cross country can sometimes be messy. This was handy and easily within reach each time I had something to throw away, large or small.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a 89 Ford Bronco. Unfortunately I didn’t think about the fact that the vehicle doesn’t have adjustable headrests. However, I placed the strap under the lid of the very large center console and made it work. It seems to be a good quality product. And does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use in our 2015 kia Sedona van. I out the strap around the center council lid so it can hang in the back and it worked perfectly. It was exactly the right length. Now my kids have a garbage can that won't get knocked over when they get in and out!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this great car trash bag!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy trash bag. I just put a plastic store bag inside for easy trash removal that doesn't require me to do any extra cleanup. I only wish there was a way to keep the bottom secure against the back of my seat. I haven't had any issues yet, but I feel like I might at some point. Other than that, I love the quality and the price!
customer_reviews.author: Katie M

customer_reviews.title: nifty idea for storage
customer_reviews.text: these have pretty much room in them and seem well made....i just got them today and placed in my car so we will see how well they hold up...i purchased them to store items in that i use often, and i'm glad to get the clutter of bags off of my car floors!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great value, roomy but not too big!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, hang it from my my shifter, wish it held its shape better, it tends to fold up a little but for the price, great!! I have a box of tissues in it which is convenient, put a bag to the side for trash! Sometimes I put a water bottle in it too!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Relatively low profile and velcros shut when not full to ...
customer_reviews.text: Relatively low profile and velcros shut when not full to take up even less room, yet holds quite a bit. Works as stated. We have ours on the back of the passenger seat of our truck and it doesn't get in the way of kids getting in and out the back seat. Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: yoadri99

customer_reviews.title: Right-sized and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size to hang on a seatback, and doesn't hang down low or take up leg room in the back seat. Durable and waterproof so drink cups don't leak out when the ice melts, if people put cups in there.
customer_reviews.author: Act162This

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Your Car Tidy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my grandmother and she loves it. Durable design and easy to install. Highly recommended to keep your car tidy.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyRoo

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as picture
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive the item as shown in the photos. The trash bag in the pictures is clearly a square, & the one I got is more of a football-like shape...not square. It doesn’t look like it’ll hold much. I may be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen C

customer_reviews.title: Best Car Trash Bin I have Purchased
customer_reviews.text: The car trash bin and very durable. I have owned a few, and this one is the best by far. Main reason being, it is lined! This goes on the passenger sides so my 5 year old can put all of his garbage in it, instead of throwing it on the floor. It is also fairly large.
customer_reviews.author: becca352

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I drive for a living and this is a god send. No more candy wrappers and tiny empty water bottles on the ground or in the seats. Thinking of getting another one but putting the waters I give out in there. The pocket in front is great for labeling. So one would be labeled trash and the other waters. May be too complicated for drunk people. 😉 It looks classy and I'm very pleased with it in my Honda CR-V.
customer_reviews.author: HollyB

customer_reviews.title: Worth $18 - 24 easily.  Buy this car trash container!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing value! This trash bin seems very well made and durable. I'm totally pleased with it This price is super ridiculous, so don't even think twice and buy this bag! I don't know how they can produce a bag this nice for this price, so don't wait. That's my advice.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBlissSatsang

customer_reviews.title: No complaints, good trash can!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing trash can! It is larger than I thought it would be, but that’s a good thing! It can hold quite a bit of trash. I use it mainly fir paper goods, but I did just toss an empty protein shake can in there... No complaints though!
customer_reviews.author: Big_Boi23

customer_reviews.title: One year and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Easy to clean. I keep it behind the passenger headrest so it is easy for me to use. I've had it for a year and it's one of my favorite purchases
customer_reviews.author: HeatherHiker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: great gear for the car! I had to use it yesterday when my dughter was sick. It saved my car from a disaster, i won't post the pictures but tust me it worked?
customer_reviews.author: mkurit

customer_reviews.title: stand up litter bag for the car
customer_reviews.text: This Litter bag is good size , wipes clean,, and stands on the car floor or hangs from the headrest post. Great produck at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Teacher

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why but the exposed trash in the picture looks nicer than the exposed trash in my car. It gets the job done--and is quite attractive when closed--but riding around with an open trash bag waving at passersby does not make me feel special.
customer_reviews.author: Pret813

customer_reviews.title: Had this bag a just few months and one road ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this bag a just few months and one road trip when the strap came totally away from the bag; it was stitched in but apparently not well. I stitched it back in by hand, a difficult repair because of the tough, thick material. The size of the bag is more than ample and because of its size it rides on the floor; on the back of the front seat it takes up too much of the back seat passenger's space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft sided hanging car trash bin.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a hard (plastic) trash bin before. This doesn't bang against the back of the seat like the ' 'hard one, and being soft, it has some give for tall riders' knees in the back seat. I thought it was easy to install in my van. All in all a great product
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this trash bag! Very durable and holds quite a bit of trash. Fits perfectly in my vehicle in the middle of the back seat floorboard! And the hook helps hold it in place by putting it around my middle console in the front!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works like it is supposed to. If I need a tissue while driving or need to throw anything away I can easily throw it in the trash can behind the passenger seat. Very convenient and I like not having to look at trash in the front seat. Easy to empty and the inside can be washed out.
customer_reviews.author: Kabe

customer_reviews.title: Good size.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for the car. I wish the strap was longer as I want to put it between the 2 front seats for easy front seat access. I think this item could be used as a cooler too, but it isn't sealed completely, but there is a velcro closure.
customer_reviews.author: jolivesincos

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the momma van!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have 3 littles (all under 5) and this has helped me keep the car nice and tidy! I use it just like a regular garbage bag filling it up during our drives and then dumping it when full. The waterproof liner helps capture any spells from leftover juice in juice boxes or milk containers. A need for any family car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, nice looking
customer_reviews.text: It fits nicely on the back of the passenger seat and I can reach back and throw trash in it. It also Velcro’s closed so the trash doesn’t have to show. You can just empty when getting gas and it can be wiped down if something spills inside. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: It's great for wrappers and such
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trash bin for my car with the intention of keeping it cleaner. This worked for the most part, although the capacity of the bag isn't quite what I need. It's great for wrappers and such, but doesn't hold many cans or empty coffee cups. Also, it's really unfortunate to have to sit behind it if you're a passenger, because it's very much in your personal space. Who wants a lap full of trash? But I'm never really a passenger in my own car so I don't feel too bad. 3/5
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Torchia

customer_reviews.title: I don't thinkI'd want it there if using the bag in a car but I get it can be used like a little cooler
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these not for the car but to clip on boys bunkbeds so they had a place to stash more toys or their watercups. Working well. Lots of room. Didn't need the velcro inside. I don't thinkI'd want it there if using the bag in a car but I get it can be used like a little cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Renee C

customer_reviews.title: EMPTY YOUR BAG EVERY SO OFTEN! LOL
customer_reviews.text: I always remember having some kind of trash bag growing up while on road trip or just everyday use. This bag is durable and makes it easy to keep my car clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trash bin!
customer_reviews.text: Very handy trash bin. It fits over the back of the seat perfectly. It is roomy and I love that it is waterproof. The additional side pockets are perfect for tissues and the bigger pocket on the front holds a pack of baby wipes. Overall this is just what I needed. I'd recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Melian578

customer_reviews.title: Effective trash and storage option
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Was easy to install with clip on strap to ease use. Love the Velcro closure and the 3 front and side mesh pockets are easy to see where items are stored. Waterproof inside makes for no worries as to what items are in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Works well as car trash can.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the car and its seeming to work well. Only 4 stars b/c the sides are tending to fold in, I think b/c the way they were packaged and mailed. Haven't tested the "water proof" of it yet but it's working well as a trash receptacle.
customer_reviews.author: Family of 4

customer_reviews.title: ... well as a trash can and also does a good job of holding my son's DVD's when we are ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a trash can and also does a good job of holding my son's DVD's when we are traveling and I am putting them in the van DVD player for him. Leakproof and even looks nice. When no one is riding in passenger seat I turn it around so it's even easier to throw my trash in. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: JJsMommy

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Use this as a storage bag behind the front passenger seat. Holds my steering wheel lap table and lunch items. Am glad I have it.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke in 2 days. Cheaply made. Had to throw away. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to match car interior and it does. Plus I like it’s style and ability to stay open or tightly closed. It seems to be well made but I’ve only had it for two months.
customer_reviews.author: discerning/fussy life appreciator

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is working perfectly for me. My small vehicle doesn't have a lot of space so I put it behind the passenger seat and reach back there and put trash into it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Brinkley

customer_reviews.title: VELCRO STRIPS ACROSS TOP
customer_reviews.text: Is the best part of this trash can. Just seal across the top and you can't see or smell the trash. Another plus for me was the ability to hang it on the back of the seat - now those pesky mice can't get to it. Plenty big for most car trash.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Britton

customer_reviews.title: Trash organizer
customer_reviews.text: It is completely a user friendly item to have in your vehicle. It hold trash and can be place in an out of the way place in your car. No more trash on the floor or door in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Long

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handy little trash bag to keep in your car. I used mine for a long road trip. You dont have to put trash in it, if you dont want to, you can use it as extra storing space eg for water bottles, car items etc.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and insulated to prevent any liquids from dripping onto my car floor. This bag is well crafted and durable - I could tell it's a high quality product as soon as I opened the box. I've purchased similarly priced bags and was dissapointed at how flimsy and poorly made they were. If you're looking for a trash container for your car, get THIS one.
customer_reviews.author: J. CHANDLER

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is secure hooked on the seat and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is secure hooked on the seat and it is big enough to hold more trash the only thing I don't like is it has to be hooked on the back of a seat so the people in the front find it hard to reach
customer_reviews.author: Bessie Walker

customer_reviews.title: nice, easy to clean, large
customer_reviews.text: works just as advertised. quick release buckles make its easy to take off and rinse out if you need. large enough to carry trash from work week (I work in my car 40 hours/ week). no leaks
customer_reviews.author: Cara K.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. I could see paying double for it. I had a $5 one from Walmart and it was absolute garbage. This one is heavy and the pockets are a plus.
customer_reviews.author: TCGF F.

customer_reviews.title: Used lightly for less than a month and strap already broken
customer_reviews.text: I have had this car trash bin for less than a month, barely used it and the strap is already broken! Not happy and would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: H. White

customer_reviews.title: Broken did not last
customer_reviews.text: Had it maybe 2 months before the strap ripped from the bag making it uselss. Worked great until then. My son had magazines, just a few, and some Kleenex and would occasionally have a water in there. Should have held the weight. Disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but a couple negatives
customer_reviews.text: Needed a trash bag for our 2015 Jeep Cherokee. In my car, the rear seating is compromised and the bin has to be removed for anybody sitting in that position. Larger cars probably not a problem. Someday I'll have to order another one for behind the passenger seat because DW is tired of tossing my gum and sticky trash into the bin for me because I can't reach behind my head!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: It's roomy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, it's perfect! I love how roomy it is and has a wide mouth for easy placing of litter from front seat without having to turn around! I bought 4 of them! Its
customer_reviews.author: OLGA BARNES

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice!
customer_reviews.text: You can hang it in the front passenger seat then swing it to the back when you have a passenger. Fits small water bottles as well as trash. Bought two, one for each car, and we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: No car mess
customer_reviews.text: The bag fits nicely on the back of the seat and it is now so convenient to throw trash away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them... More than a garbage can.
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I bought 2 of these. Not using them as trash cans but as storage for kids stuff when they are in the car. Head phones for car entertainment system, tablets, water bottles and whatever other trinkets they bring in the car. Super good quality. Would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Broncorado

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's alright I guess. A bit too soft for my likings. I think the bag should be a bit firmer in order to hold it's shape.
customer_reviews.author: Drummer

customer_reviews.title: I would like to find some plastic liners to fit and a ...
customer_reviews.text: I would like to find some plastic liners to fit and a strap from bottom of the bin to the bottom of the seat to secure it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best car garbage can—  hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic customer service and great product- it’s really keeping our car so so much cleaner and it doesn’t get knocked over like the floor ones did— buying another one for our other car today!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size and quality construction
customer_reviews.text: This trash bin is a good size (I have an SUV) and seems very sturdy and well made. I've not tested if it's truly waterproof, but it's thick and feels solid, so I don't doubt it'll hold liquid. The velcro closure is convenient so trash doesn't tumble out, and the surface area of the base keeps it standing on the floor. A good buy to keep your car a little less messy.
customer_reviews.author: mimirv

customer_reviews.title: Strap Clip is Warped; doesn't stay closed.
customer_reviews.text: Bag itself is OK, but surprised the strap clip is warped and doesn't secure the bag to the car headrest. Had to use a zip tie to fasten the strap permanently. Very disappointing considering the good feedback on this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping small items cold or for storage.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic idea although it really isn't large enough - or strong enough - to hold much. For just a few bottles of water or perhaps a nutrition drink to be kept cold would be great. If you need to add ice it wouldn't be strong enough to hold it. Also comes in handy for grocery shopping as we put ice cream in it taking it home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: I hung it over the passenger's side of my car so i can easily reach behind to throw out tissues or cans. I don't use the side pockets for anything. I just wanted to keep the trash in one place in my car until I could throw it out. probably can fit like 4-5 cans and tissues.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: I don't love it but it's fine
customer_reviews.text: Picture makes it look larger then it is. Gets the job done kind of. I don't love it but it's fine. Kind of looks like a tiny cooler bag without a top in person.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Guillard

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Put this in our Jeep Wrangler. It's the perfect size,. Keeps wondering contained in a small space. Wranglers are small inside so this saved us precious floor space and added extra storage Space with the outside pockets.
customer_reviews.author: neasie62

customer_reviews.title: A special bag to transport your travel needs.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product; however I would have liked to have another handle on the other side That way it would be easily transportable when in route to your vehicle.. But otherwise, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: IVORY J. PERKINS

customer_reviews.title: Nice car bin. Fits just right on passenger side.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, the right size, and the velcro closure is a nice extra. Expands very well. It certainly looks like a waterproof interior. It could be used for other things as well. It's a good size for water bottles etc. It seems to give a bit so if you are one to stuff a bunch of trash in it, it will handle it.
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my car clean.
customer_reviews.text: Helps keep my car clean. I don't have a lot of people in my car so the placement of this doesn't affect anyone however if you are constantly having people in the back seat it might bother someone with trash in their face
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

product_meta.title: EPAUTO Car Garbage Trash Can w/Storage Pockets
feature_bullets: Keep your vehicle clean, organized, out of trash
Fasteners seal unsightly garbage out of view
Size is 10" x 8.75" x 5.75" with adjustable buckle 16.5" ~ 29"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,088 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
